articles.title: Gold flat near one-week low after hawkish Fed, higher yields
articles.description: Gold was flat on Thursday, holding near a one-week low hit in the previous session, after the Federal Reserve decided on March rate hikes that pushed up U.S. Treasury yields and the dollar, while uncertainty over Ukraine capped bullion's losses.
